mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT G.GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE, G.GRAD_COND FROM STUDENT S JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DT_CD = D.COLGE_CD JOIN GRADUATION G ON D.COLGE_CD = G.COLGE_CD WHERE S.ST_CD = #{stCd} ORDER BY G.GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE
SELECT C.COLGE_NM, D.DT_NM FROM STUDENT S JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DT_CD = D.DT_CD JOIN COLLEGE C ON D.COLGE_CD = C.COLGE_CD WHERE S.ST_CD = #{stCd}
SELECT DISTINCT GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE FROM GRADUATION ORDER BY GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE
SELECT COLGE_CD, COLGE_NM FROM COLLEGE ORDER BY COLGE_NM
SELECT G.GRAD_COND FROM GRADUATION G JOIN COLLEGE C ON G.COLGE_CD = C.COLGE_CD ORDER BY G.GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE, C.COLGE_NM
SELECT GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE, COLGE_CD FROM GRADUATION WHERE GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE = #{geGradCondType} and COLGE_CD = #{colgeCd}
SELECT GE_GRAD_COND_TYPE, GRAD_COND FROM GRADUATION WHERE COLGE_CD = #{colgeCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDENT SET ST_STATUS = '졸업', ST_GRAD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') WHERE ST_CD = #{stCd}
